x-sap-shortText: API for role based permission, such as access list of available roles.

x-servers.description: OData APIs for the SuccessFactors Data Centers

info.title: Role Based Permissions
info.description: API for role based permission, such as access list of available roles, list of rules for a given role or list of rules across all roles and grant a role to a user.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific
